code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{Carousel,Image}from"react-bootstrap";import Loader from"./Loader";import Message from"./Message";import{listTopProducts}from"../actions/productActions";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProductCarousel=function ProductCarousel(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var topRatedProducts=useSelector(function(state){return state.topRatedProducts;});var loading=topRatedProducts.loading,error=topRatedProducts.error,products=topRatedProducts.products;useEffect(function(){dispatch(listTopProducts());},[dispatch]);return loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{}):error?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Message,{variant:"error",children:error}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{pause:"hover",fade:true,style:{backgroundImage:'url("https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2017/02/12/12/42/wall-2059909_640.png")'},keyboard:true,children:products.map(function(product,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Item,{id:i,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{className:"carousel-img",src:product.image,alt:product.name,fluid:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Caption,{className:"carousel-caption",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[product.name," ($",product.price,")"]})})]})},product._id);})});};export default ProductCarousel;
